column2: "Ah! Hey partner, you came at just the right time. Listen to this!"
"Who, you ask? That rumored dark figure. It looked like he was searching for something."
"Just another ARKS member on a quest? No, that definitely wasn't it."
"I've never seen anyone that creepy-looking among the ARKS!"
"It was from a distance, but he just looked all black."
"Anyway, if you're going to the Tundra, then be careful. I'm heading back now. Later!"
